content.rendered:
Directed by Abhay Pannu.

Written by Nikkhil Advani. Abhay Koranne. Kausar Munir. Abhay Pannu. Abhay Pannu. Shiv Singh.

Cast  Jim Sarbh( Homi Bhabha / … ) . Ishwak Singh( Vikram Sarabhai ) . Dibyendu Bhattacharya( Raza Mehdi ) . Saba Azad( Parvana Irani ) . Regina Cassandra( Mrinalini Sarabhai ) . K.C. Shankar( Vishwesh Mathur ) . Namit Das( Prosenjit Dey ) . Ashmita Meghrajani( Mridula Sarabhai ) . Rajiv Kachroo( JRD Tata ) . Darius Shroff( Jehangir Bhabha ) . Rajit Kapoor( Jawaharlal Nehru ) . Neha Chauhan( Kamla Chaudhary ) . Arjun Radhakrishnan( A. P. J. Abdul Kalam ) .Tariq Khan . Kaustav Sinha( Assistant Kaustubh ) . T.M. Karthik Srinivasan( C. V. Raman ) . Richard John Lovatt( William Crenshaw III ) . Charu Shankar( Indira Gandhi ) . Sandeep Chatterjee( Bholanath Mullick ) . Ashton Bessette( CIA HQ Agent 2 ) . Muni Jha( Ambalal Sarabhai ) . Pravina Bhagwat Deshpande( Sarladevi Sarabhai ) . Nikhil Singh( CC Student 1 ) . Francisco Raymond( Banglore District Court Judge ) . Lakshhya Sharma( CC Student 2 ) . Navneet Yesare( Court Clerk ) . Suranjana Biswas( CC Student 3 ) . Narad Lopez Miguel( Court Clerk ) . Vinita Venugopal( Mrinalini’s friend ) . Manu Krish( IISC Student 1 ) . Anand Prapanna( King of Mysore ) . Avinash Erapatti( IISC Student 2 ) . Carl A. Harte( Mr. Bennet ) . Ed Robinson( Miller ) .Rajan Kapur . Sammy Jonas Heaney( Younger brother of foreigner family (2022) unknow) . K.S. Sridhar( K Karnad(2022) unknow)

Language Hindi.

Producers Monisha Advani. Madhu Bhojwani. Siddharth Roy Kapur. Nikkhil Advani. Roshni Ghosh. Malvika Khatri. Priyanka Mehrotra. Jinesh Shah. Meenakshi Sharma. Meenakshi Sharma. Rameshchandra Yadav.

Production Emmay Entertainment. Roy Kapur Films.

 

Number of Seasons 2

Number of Episodes 16

Status OnGoing (2022–)
